columns.name: name
columns.description: The resource name.

columns.name: id
columns.description: The resource identifier.

columns.name: type
columns.description: The resource type.

columns.name: account_id
columns.description: The unique identifier associated with this data lake store account.

columns.name: creation_time
columns.description: The account creation time.

columns.name: current_tier
columns.description: The commitment tier in use for current month.

columns.name: default_group
columns.description: The default owner group for all new folders and files created in the data lake store account.

columns.name: encryption_state
columns.description: The current state of encryption for this data lake store account.

columns.name: encryption_provisioning_state
columns.description: The current state of encryption provisioning for this data lake store account.

columns.name: endpoint
columns.description: The full cname endpoint for this account.

columns.name: firewall_state
columns.description: The current state of the IP address firewall for this data lake store account.

columns.name: last_modified_time
columns.description: The account last modified time.

columns.name: new_tier
columns.description: The commitment tier to use for next month.

columns.name: provisioning_state
columns.description: The provisioning status of the data lake store account.

columns.name: state
columns.description: The state of the data lake store account.

columns.name: trusted_id_provider_state
columns.description: The current state of the trusted identity provider feature for this data lake store account.

columns.name: diagnostic_settings
columns.description: A list of active diagnostic settings for the data lake store.

columns.name: encryption_config
columns.description: The key vault encryption configuration.

columns.name: firewall_allow_azure_ips
columns.description: The current state of allowing or disallowing IPs originating within azure through the firewall. If the firewall is disabled, this is not enforced.

columns.name: firewall_rules
columns.description: The list of firewall rules associated with this data lake store account.

columns.name: identity
columns.description: The key vault encryption identity, if any.

columns.name: trusted_id_providers
columns.description: The list of trusted identity providers associated with this data lake store account.

columns.name: virtual_network_rules
columns.description: The list of virtual network rules associated with this data lake store account.
